Package sledgehammer.lua

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LuaArray<T>
    A very convenient LuaObject that stores elements as an ArrayList, allowing exporting into proper KahluaTables without any boilerplate code.
    LuaListener
    Example EventListener showing how to interface with the ScriptEvent.
    LuaObject
    An abstract utility Class that allows proper organization and export of KahluaTables for complex data structures.
    LuaTable
    Abstract definitions class for KahluaTables.
    MongoLuaObject<M extends MongoDocument>
    Boilerplate utility Class to handle the generic assignment of MongoDocuments to exported LuaTables.
    Send
    LuaTable sub-class to identify the String Client ID of the Module being interfaced and the String command to identify the sub-routine to interface.
